Aristotle: I need to review my week and see if I handled a conflict with my sibling with the right amount of assertiveness (courage).
DeBeauvoir: I felt like I was acting in 'bad faith' at a meeting this week. Can we analyze why I didn't speak my true feelings?
Hooks: I observed a microaggression at work this week and didn't act. I want to review my internal biases and plan a better response.
Kant: I made two separate decisions this week, one about money and one about time. Were they both morally consistent with my duty?
Nagarjuna: I had a moment of high anxiety when a project failed. Can we reflect on what fixed idea I was attached to that caused the suffering?
Nietzsche: I made good progress on a difficult fitness goal this week. Can we review this progress and set a higher challenge for next week?
Nussbaum: How well did I develop my 'Affiliation' capability this week, and what barriers kept me from connecting better with my community?
Dewey: I tried a new method for organizing my finances this week. I need to reflect on what worked, what failed, and what I learned from the experience.
